channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Election Denier Tina Peters Was ‘Pardoned’ by Trump. She’s Still in Prison
item.description: Former election clerk Tina Peters is a hero to conspiracy theorists, and even received an empty “pardon” from the president. Colorado's governor has h...

item.title: AMD Ryzen 7 9850X3D CPU Review: Gaming’s Best Chip
item.description: This year’s Ryzen is still my top choice for PC games.

item.title: 6 Best VPN Services (2026), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Every VPN says it’s the best, but only some of them are telling the truth.

item.title: The AI infrastructure boom shows no sign of slowing down
item.description: ASML’s record orders show chipmakers are still betting big on AI data centers.

item.title: Trump’s acting cybersecurity chief uploaded sensitive government docs to ChatGPT
item.description: A report cited officials as saying that Homeland Security sought to determine if there was any harm to government security as a result of the lapse.

item.title: Sony Bravia 5 Review: An Excellent Mid-Tier TV for Cinephiles
item.description: This mid-tier Sony comes with its highest-end processor, and that's a big deal for home theater nerds.

item.title: Standard Nuclear raises $140M as nuclear power enters its gold rush era
item.description: Investors including a16z are betting that nuclear industry suppliers will be the big winners of the AI demand-driven nuclear renaissance.

item.title: The Best Ski Helmets, Editor Tested and Reviewed (2026)
item.description: This is an essential item for all skiers and snowboarders. WIRED has tested the best helmets for all abilities and budgets.
